organizations involved in the processing of personal data of EU Citizens, emphasising transparency, security and accountability. AerCap applies GDPR requirements globally through uniform procedures
The responsibility is on all AerCap employees to protect and use personal data appropriately. AerCap employees enjoy the enhanced protection of their personal data in accordance with GDPR
